name: Neckbeards: Basement Arena
description: Based on classic arcade games like Robotron 2084, Neckbeards is non-stop action for one or two players with an epic soundtrack and a taste for psychedelia.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1 GHz or faster Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Monitor capable of a 1280x720 resolution DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 175 MB available space
